perturbation.original_text:
Client will pay Excite these revenue
                           share payments within thirty (30) days after the close
                           of the financial quarter in which Client recognizes
                           the Net Revenue on these transactions.
perturbation.changed_text:
Client will pay Excite these revenue
                           share payments within ninety (90) days after the close
                           of the financial quarter in which Client recognizes
                           the Net Revenue on these transactions.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline from 30 days to 90 days. This creates ambiguity about when Excite should expect payment and when the Client is considered late on payments.

perturbation.original_text:
All undisputed payments that have accrued prior to
                           the termination or expiration of this Agreement will
                           be payable in full within thirty (30) days thereof.
perturbation.changed_text:
All undisputed payments that have accrued prior to
                           the termination or expiration of this Agreement will
                           be payable in full immediately.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the payment deadline from 30 days to immediately upon termination or expiration of the agreement. This creates confusion and potential disputes over when these payments are due, especially in relation to Section 7(g) which now states 90 days.

perturbation.original_text:
Client will provide
                           to Excite all User Data and
                           user transaction reports collected by Client within
                           thirty (30) days following the end of each calendar
                           month during the term of this Agreement in a
                           mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.changed_text:
Client will provide
                           to Excite all User Data and
                           user transaction reports collected by Client immediately following the end of each calendar
                           month during the term of this Agreement in a
                           mutually-determined electronic format.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by changing the delivery date of user data from 30 days to immediately after the end of the calendar month. This may cause disputes over how long Client has to deliver such data and how it affects the optimization of sponsorship programs.
